description.en: Brony Radio Germany is the web radio for German-speaking Bronies. We stream 24/7 music for everyone and it's all about ponies.
description.ga_IE: Is é Brony Radio An Ghearmáin an raidió gréasáin do bhrúnna labhartha na Gearmáine. Sruthlaímid 24/7 ceol do gach duine agus tá sé go léir faoi phonies.
